original_text: But Asahel refused to give up the pursuit; so Abner thrust the butt of his spear into Asahel’s stomach, and the spear came out through his back. He fell there and died on the spot. And every man stopped when he came to the place where Asahel had fallen and died.
korean_text: 그가 물러가기를 거절하매 아브넬이 창 뒤 끝으로 그의 배를 찌르니 창이 그의 등을 꿰뚫고 나간지라 곧 그 곳에 엎드러져 죽으매 아사헬이 엎드러져 죽은 곳에 이르는 자마다 머물러 섰더라

sentences.original_text: But Asahel refused to give up the pursuit
so Abner thrust the butt of his spear into Asahel's stomach
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아브넬은 자신의 창 자루를 아사엘의 배에 꽂았습니다

sentences.original_text: and the spear came out through his back
He fell there and died on the spot
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에서 쓰러져 그 자리에서 죽었습니다

sentences.original_text: And every man stopped when he came to the place
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 사람은 그 장소에 이르렀을 때 멈춰섰습니다

sentences.original_text: where Asahel had fallen and died
